section.name: Development Tooling Tutorial
section.p: Also know as adding a little magic to your development toolkit.

tr.td: A walk through of setting up an index, creating a couple of projects, adding some content, executing a build, followed by a review of the process and the generated project resources.
Addition of a testcase to our 'system' project and demonstration of the automatic compilation and test execution provided by Magic.
A simple example of build customization using an explicit build.xml file. The example demonstrates the usage of classic Ant filters and the Depot filter task within an extended init phase.
This tutorial takes us through the process of module creation and and includes an summary of the generated module and it's potential application when publishing content.
